definitions.text: a form of energy that is transferred by a difference in temperature
the sensation caused by heat energy
the trait of being intensely emotional
applies to nonhuman mammals: a state or period of heightened sexual arousal and activity
a preliminary race in which the winner advances to a more important race

examples: heat the water on the stove

definitions.text: arouse or excite feelings and passions
examples: The ostentatious way of living of the rich ignites the hatred of the poor
The refugees' fate stirred up compassion around the world
